oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bird's eye view of Nashville, circa 1907
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A postcard aerial view of the Rutledge Hill area of Nashville and old Howard School with its bell tower visible in the foreground, circa 1907. The Nashville skyline is visible in the background. Forms part of the Nashville Room Postcard Collection. 1 postcard : col. ; 3.5 x 5.5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Howard School (Nashville, Tenn.)
